330690.name: Quantum Rush Champions Original Soundtracks
330690.description:
This DLC contains the original Quantum Rush: Champions soundtracks in mp3 format.
They will be downloaded into the folder "QR_Champions_OST" in your local game folder.

  • 01 - Golden Dawn (2:14)
  • 02 - Megalopolis (2:33)
  • 03 - Levitation, (2:20)
  • 04 - The Waves, (2:59)
  • 05 - Almighty (3:20)
  • 06 - Return of the Diesel (3:53)
  • 07 - Animorph (3:56)
  • 08 - Vacation on Mars (3:32)
  • 09 - Sirius B (3:25)
  • 10 - The Assets of Space (2:46)
  • 11 - Electrotherapy (2:58)
  • 12 - Land of Ashes (3:26)

  • Bonus Tracks:

  • 13 - Astra Demo (0:53)
  • 14 - Aftermath (0:49)
  • 15 - Crystal (3:04)
  • 16 - Cut Up (1:11)

Loops

And all the tracks above as loops!
330690.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
